sentence.content: BFN Tokyo -- An F-15 fighter of the U.S. Forces on Okinawa crashed near Kadena Air Base on 4 April.
sentence.syntactictree: (ROOT (NP (NP (NNP BFN) (NNP Tokyo)) (: --) (S (NP (NP (DT An) (NN F-15) (NN fighter)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (DT the) (NNP U.S.) (NNS Forces)) (PP (IN on) (NP (NNP Okinawa)))))) (VP (VBD crashed) (PP (IN near) (NP (NP (NNP Kadena) (NNP Air) (NNP Base)) (PP (IN on) (NP (CD 4))))) (NP-TMP (NNP April)))) (. .)))

chunking.string: BFN Tokyo -- An F-15 fighter of the U.S. Forces on Okinawa crashed near Kadena Air Base on 4 April .
An F-15 fighter of the U.S. Forces on Okinawa
crashed near Kadena Air Base on 4 April

sentence.content: Commenting on the crash, Akira Takeshita, deputy director general of the Defense Facilities Administration Agency , said, "Such a crash should not have occurred and it is very regrettable that the crash actually occurred."
sentence.syntactictree: (ROOT (S (S (VP (VBG Commenting) (PP (IN on) (NP (DT the) (NN crash))))) (, ,) (NP (NP (NNP Akira) (NNP Takeshita)) (, ,) (NP (NP (NN deputy) (NN director) (NN general)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT the) (NNP Defense) (NNP Facilities) (NNP Administration) (NNP Agency)))) (, ,)) (VP (VBD said) (, ,) (`` ``) (S (S (NP (JJ Such) (DT a) (NN crash)) (VP (MD should) (RB not) (VP (VB have) (VP (VBN occurred))))) (CC and) (S (NP (PRP it)) (VP (VBZ is) (ADJP (RB very) (JJ regrettable)) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (DT the) (NN crash)) (ADVP (RB actually)) (VP (VBD occurred)))))))) (. .) ('' '')))

sentence.content: He also made it clear that shortly after the crash, the DFAA asked the command of the U.S. Forces in Japan to take thorough measures for safe management of the U.S. military bases on Okinawa and conduct a thorough investigation into the cause of the crash.

sentence.content: The Kadena Air Base public affairs office gave a briefing on the crash and the DFAA released the briefing.

gave a briefing on the crash

sentence.content: The briefing said: An F-15 fighter taking off from Kadena Air Base on a routine training crashed near the air base at 0924 on 4 April.
sentence.syntactictree: (ROOT (S (S (NP (DT The) (NN briefing)) (VP (VBD said))) (: :) (S (NP (NP (DT An) (NN F-15) (NN fighter)) (VP (VBG taking) (PRT (RP off)) (PP (IN from) (NP (NP (NNP Kadena) (NNP Air) (NNP Base)) (PP (IN on) (NP (DT a) (JJ routine) (NN training))))))) (VP (VBD crashed) (PP (IN near) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN air) (NN base)) (PP (IN at) (NP (CD 0924))))) (PP (IN on) (NP (CD 4))) (NP-TMP (NNP April)))) (. .)))

sentence.content: The crashed aircraft belonged to the 44th Fighter Squadron of the 18th Wing and the pilot safely ejected from the aircraft without injuries.

sentence.content: A team will begin investigating the cause of the crash and details of the accident will be made public once the investigation is completed.

sentence.content: The U.S. military aircraft crashed about 800 meters northeast of a Kadena Air Base runway and the crash site is within the air base&apost;s facilities.

sentence.content: Mr. Takeshita said: "As for the safe management of the U.S. military bases on Okinawa, we have long asked the U.S. side for it.

sentence.content: The DFAA immediately expressed regret to the command of the U.S. Forces in Yokota over the crash and the Naha DFAA Bureau expressed regret to the commander of the U.S. Forces on Okinawa.
